title: Randoms, Part 1: Taipei Cycle Show 2025
content:
An inexpensive wireless and real-time tire pressure sensor, Sugino's 'capacity expander' pulleys, a budget 3D-printed saddle, and more from Taipei Cycle Show 2025.

Read the full article at Randoms, Part 1: Taipei Cycle Show 2025 on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
